text: Jenumanja (Asilamu) m'bele nkutula wambone nnope waukoposyedwe (pakusagulidwa chilikati cha mikutula josope kuti uwe wakamuchisya) ku wandu, nkulamulaga (kutenda) yambone ni nkukanyaga yakusakala, soni ni nkukulupililaga mwa Allah. Mwanti wawapedwile chitabu (Ayuda ni Akilisito) ingawe wakulupilile (pakunda Usilamu), ingaliji yambone kukwao, wane mwa jamanjao wana chikulupi, nambo wajinjio wakunyosya
